author: perezhilton
title: Katy Perry's Grammys Look Is Fucking AWFUL!! | CocoPerez.com
text:
JESUS!!
What the actual fuck is Katy Perry wearing to the Grammys ?!
It's a baggy Tom Ford sequin top with a feathered bottom. Isn't this supposed to be her moment with the singer's new jam Chained To The Rhythm released a few days ago.
Lorraine Schwartz jewels finished off her bold look.
Love you babe, but fire your stylist and define this new era!!
[ Image via Getty Images .]
Tags: fashion smashion , grammys , katy perry , lorraine schwartz , red carpet , tom ford
